trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per il <xref href="System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: You create a handler for the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event when you want to customize how the user's credentials are authenticated at run time.
trans-unit.target: Creare un gestore per il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>evento quando si desidera personalizzare la modalità di autenticazione le credenziali dell'utente in fase di esecuzione.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: The AuthenticatingEventArgs class supplies values to any <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event handler.
trans-unit.target: La classe AuthenticatingEventArgs fornisce i valori per qualsiasi <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>gestore dell'evento.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: By using the properties available in this class, you can retrieve the user credentials to customize authentication.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzando le proprietà disponibili in questa classe, è possibile recuperare le credenziali utente per personalizzare l'autenticazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class raises the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event before validating the user credentials.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>classe genera il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>evento prima di convalidare le credenziali dell'utente.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class constructs an instance of the AuthenticatingEventArgs object and passes it to any <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>costruisce un'istanza dell'oggetto AuthenticatingEventArgs e la passa a qualsiasi classe <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>gestore dell'evento.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A>, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> and <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> properties to retrieve the user credentials.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A>, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A>e <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A>proprietà per recuperare le credenziali utente.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> property can contain additional values that are required for authentication, such as an identification number.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A>proprietà può contenere valori aggiuntivi necessari per l'autenticazione, ad esempio un numero di identificazione.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> property indicates whether the user credentials are valid.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>proprietà indica se le credenziali utente sono valide.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>

trans-unit.source: You set the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> property to the result of your customized authentication.
trans-unit.target: Impostare il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>proprietà per il risultato dell'autenticazione personalizzata.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition, you set the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> property to `true` if you have checked the user credentials and do not want the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class to check user credentials through the default membership provider.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, si imposta la <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>proprietà `true` se si hanno archiviato le credenziali dell'utente e non si desidera che la <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>classe per controllare le credenziali utente tramite il provider di appartenenze predefinito.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user credentials are valid.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se le credenziali utente sono valide.

trans-unit.source: If you authenticate user credentials in an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event, set the Authenticated property to indicate whether the user credentials are valid.
trans-unit.target: Se le credenziali utente in un gestore eventi per l'autenticazione di <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>evento, impostare la proprietà di autenticazione per indicare se le credenziali utente sono valide.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: If the user credentials are valid and no additional validation is needed, set Authenticated to `true` and <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se le credenziali utente siano valide e che è necessaria alcuna convalida aggiuntiva, impostare autenticato `true` e <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>a `true`.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: You set the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> property to indicate that the authentication service should bypass the default steps for authenticating a user.
trans-unit.target: Impostare il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>i passaggi di proprietà per indicare che il servizio di autenticazione deve ignorare il valore predefinito per l'autenticazione di un utente.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value in Authenticated is used by the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class only if <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Viene utilizzato il valore in autenticato il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>solo se classe <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>è impostato su `true`.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> is `false`, the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class calls the default membership provider to validate user credentials, and then overwrites the value in Authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>è `false`, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>classe chiama il provider di appartenenze predefinito per convalidare le credenziali utente e quindi sovrascrive il valore in autenticato.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user credentials are valid; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se le credenziali utente vengono. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user credentials have been authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se le credenziali utente sono state autenticate.

trans-unit.source: You can set the AuthenticationIsComplete property to indicate whether the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class must authenticate the user credentials.
trans-unit.target: È possibile impostare la proprietà AuthenticationIsComplete per indicare se la <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>classe deve autenticare le credenziali dell'utente.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: If AuthenticationIsComplete is `true`, the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class does not validate the user credentials through the default membership provider.
trans-unit.target: Se è AuthenticationIsComplete `true`, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>classe non convalida le credenziali utente tramite il provider di appartenenze predefinito.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: Instead, it uses the value in <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> to determine whether to create an authentication cookie.
trans-unit.target: Utilizza invece il valore in <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>per determinare se creare un cookie di autenticazione.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>

trans-unit.source: If AuthenticationIsComplete is `false`, the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class validates the user credentials through the default membership provider and overwrites the value in the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se è AuthenticationIsComplete `false`, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>classe convalida le credenziali utente tramite il provider di appartenenze predefinito e sovrascrive il valore nel <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all the steps for validating the user credentials have been performed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se sono stati eseguiti tutti i passaggi per la convalida le credenziali dell'utente; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets additional user values for authentication.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene i valori utente aggiuntivi per l'autenticazione.

trans-unit.source: You can use the CustomCredential property to retrieve authentication values other than user name and password during the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare la proprietà CustomCredential per recuperare i valori di autenticazione diverso dal nome utente e password durante il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>evento.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: For example, an application might be configured to validate an identification number together with the user name and password.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, un'applicazione potrebbe essere configurata per convalidare un numero di identificazione con il nome utente e password.

trans-unit.source: In that case, the identification number will be passed in the `CustomCredential` parameter of the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: In tal caso, il numero di identificazione verrà passato nel `CustomCredential` parametro del <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then retrieve the custom value through the CustomCredential property.
trans-unit.target: È quindi possibile recuperare il valore personalizzato tramite la proprietà CustomCredential.

trans-unit.source: The CustomCredential property contains the customized values in the same format as they are passed to the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà CustomCredential contiene i valori personalizzati nello stesso formato in cui vengono passati per la <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event handler, if more than one value is stored in the property, you must parse the value of the CustomCredential property to retrieve the values.
trans-unit.target: Nel <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>gestore dell'evento, se più di un valore viene archiviato nella proprietà, è necessario analizzare il valore della proprietà CustomCredential per recuperare i valori.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: The values required for authentication other than user name and password.
trans-unit.target: I valori necessari per l'autenticazione diverso dal nome utente e password.

trans-unit.source: Gets the password for the user.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la password per l'utente.

trans-unit.source: You use the Password property to retrieve the password during the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la proprietà della Password per recuperare la password durante il <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>evento.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: The password to validate.
trans-unit.target: Password da convalidare.

trans-unit.source: Gets the authentication name for the user.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome di autenticazione per l'utente.

trans-unit.source: You use the UserName property to retrieve the authentication name during the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la proprietà UserName per recuperare il nome di autenticazione durante la <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>evento.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: The user name to validate.
trans-unit.target: Il nome utente da convalidare.
